cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.NE. 

The paper proposes a novel approach to allow a learning agent to ask questions, which is a common topic in the field of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML). The specific task used in the paper is colorization, which falls under computer vision (CV). The paper also discusses the development of a general framework for deep neural networks that can ask questions, which is relevant to the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper emphasizes the importance of interpretability and transparency in models, which is a topic in natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (CL). Finally, the paper discusses the potential for interactive models, which is a topic in neural engineering (cs.NE).
